item.title: Identify VMs that have VMware Tools with the OpenSSL v3 vulnerability
item.description: In OpenSSL version 3.0.0 to 3.0.6, a critical vulnerability is found (link ). A lot of vendors use these versions of OpenSSL in their products. VMware has the following statement: To date, no VMware products have been found to be critically impacted by CVE-2022-3602 or CVE-2022-3786. Regardless, VMware products that consume OpenSSL 3.0.x will consume 3.0.7 fixes as a precautionary measure in upcoming releases. VMware Tools version 12.0.0 and 12.1.0 both contain the OpenSSL 3.
